messages.en: level 24(post)
You’re Misha right? Hello.

messages.zh: ......听碎骨他说了好久，今天，终于见到你了。
messages.en: ……I’ve heard so much from Bone Breaker, and today, I finally see you in person.
……You are……an Infected too……?
Yes.

messages.zh: 为什么要加入......整合运动？
messages.en: Why did you join……Reunion Movement?
Why?

messages.zh: 我的妻子，孩子......都死在切尔诺伯格人的手里。
messages.en: My wife, children……all died in the hands of the Chernobogians.

messages.zh: 乌萨斯感染者的遭遇，比牲畜还不如。
messages.en: Ursus’s Infected, were treated worse than animals.

messages.zh: 毁灭切尔诺伯格——？作为复仇，太轻了，太轻了......
messages.en: Destroying Chernobog——? For revenge, that is too gentle, too gentle……

messages.zh: 他们手上有多少感染者的血？！
messages.en: How much Infected blood have they got on their hands?

messages.zh: 米莎——我们被人恐惧，被人愚弄，被人侮辱，被人迫害——
messages.en: Misha——We are feared, fooled, insulted, oppressed——
——Just because we are infected.
Just because of that.
Evan, come and help with our wounded.

messages.zh: 这个废弃矿场只是临时据点，大家在这里暂时整顿一下。
messages.en: This abandoned mine is only a temporary hideout, we’ll rest here for a while.

messages.zh: 等到时机成熟，我们就撤回切尔诺伯格。
messages.en: When the time is right, we’ll retreat to Chernobog.
No.

messages.zh: 我已经舍弃了那个名字。叫我碎骨。
messages.en: I have given up that name. Call me Bone Breaker.
Are you——a little scared?
Bone……Breaker?……Why?
Heh……you’ll understand.

messages.zh: 大家知道你流落龙门之后，都自告奋勇的要把你救出来。
messages.en: After knowing that you got stranded in Lungmen, everyone volunteered to come rescue you.

messages.zh: 在龙门，我们也接纳了许多感染者。
messages.en: In Lungmen, we took in many other Infected as well.
——But you……were hurting others.
I won’t……I don’t want to……
Why does the Infected have to……
An eye for an eye, that’s how it works.

messages.zh: 对待亲人，就该像春天一样温暖......
messages.en: Our kins, should be treated warm as spring……
But for our enemies————
What’s wrong?
……Do you know?
No——you——you don’t know.

messages.zh: 他们来抓我时，我被拖出门去......我看见妈妈她抓着我的手......
messages.en: When they came for me, I was dragged out of the door……I saw mother holding on to my hand……
You saw it. You must have——

messages.zh: 他们殴打她，她不肯松手......他们在雪地上拖出一条血路。
messages.en: They beat her, she wouldn’t let go……they dragged a trail of blood on the snow.

messages.zh: 如果整合运动......如果感染者能......如果————！
messages.en: If only Reunion Movement……if only the Infected can……if only—————!

messages.zh: 我们感染者就不用遭遇那么多苦难了！
messages.en: We Infected wouldn’t have suffered that much!
I……I……I didn’t dare……I……sob……
Misha……
It will be okay……everything’s gonna be okay.

messages.zh: 我不怪你。当时......谁有勇气呢？
messages.en: I don’t blame you. In that situation……who could have had the courage?

messages.zh: 但至少现在，整合运动给了我勇气。
messages.en: But at least now, Reunion Movement has given me courage.
Bone Breaker.

messages.zh: 你可以选择不相信我们。
messages.en: You can choose not to believe us.

messages.zh: ——即便你相信我们了，你也可以选择不加入我们。
messages.en: ——Even if you believe us, you can still choose not to join us.
But you are an Infected.

messages.zh: 整合运动......一定会为了感染者的自由战斗到底。
messages.en: Reunion Movement……will fight to the end for the freedom of the Infected.

messages.zh: 可你们......摧毁了切尔诺伯格。
messages.en: But you……destroyed Chernobog.
Many innocent people died——
——Innocent? Heh, who is innocent?

messages.zh: 切尔诺伯格实行隔离制度时，有谁反对过吗？
messages.en: When Chernobog adopted the isolation policy, has anyone objected?

messages.zh: 我们被拖去矿场，乌萨斯任由我们在寒冬中死去时，有谁反对过吗？
messages.en: When we were dragged to the mines, and left by Ursus to die in the winter, has anyone objected?
Has anyone, stood out, to object?!

messages.zh: ......有两个领袖，他们说过，有一些乌萨斯人，也在为了感染者抗争——
messages.en: ……There are two leaders, who once said, that there are some Ursusians fighting for the Infected as well——

messages.zh: 但他们不在切尔诺伯格。切尔诺伯格冷眼看着我们死去——
messages.en: But they were not in Chernobog. Chernobog watched us die coldly——

messages.zh: 不，切尔诺伯格乐于看到我们死去！！
messages.en: No, Chernobog was glad to see us die!!

messages.zh: 我也遇到过别的帮助感染者的人......他们......
messages.en: I have met other people helping the Infected……they……
Rhodes Island?

messages.zh: 明明是感染者，却帮助龙门，伤害我们？
messages.en: Who despite being the Infected, helps Lungmen to hurt us?

messages.zh: 杀死我们的同胞，残害我们的兄弟？
messages.en: Killing our kinds, slaughtering our brothers?
No……

messages.zh: 你看不清事实。但你现在该看清了......
messages.en: You don’t see the truth. But you should see it now……
……Sorry, I’m too heated.
It’s okay……I……
……I understand you……

messages.zh: 这么长时间以来，你过得......很辛苦吧？
messages.en: For all this time, you……had a hard time right?
Everyone’s had a hard time.

messages.zh: 而现在，至少每个人都抱着希望。
messages.en: But now, at least we’ve all got hope.

messages.zh: 塔露拉......是她带领感染者，反抗残忍的一切。
messages.en: Talulah……she’s the one that’s leading the Infected, fighting against this cruel world.

messages.zh: 整合运动就是我们的希望。
messages.en: Reunion Movement is our hope.
……Everyone’s been through many hardships.

messages.zh: 如果整合运动真的能保护他们的话......
messages.en: If Reunion Movement can really protect them……

messages.zh: 当然了。整合运动会保护大家......我也会保护你。
messages.en: Of course. Reunion Movement will protect everyone……I will protect you too.
I’ll never let you get hurt again.
————Bone Breaker……
Ahh, found them——!

messages.zh: 看来之前的几次进攻让他们损失不小呢。
messages.en: Looks like the previous attacks did a lot of damage to them.

messages.zh: 预估一下他们的撤退路线，和方位一起发给阿米娅。
messages.en: Evaluate their retreating paths, and send them to Amiya along with the coordinate.
——Let’s not keep Reunion Movement idle for too long.
